thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1795
thread.title: Carolina from Montreal
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by Carolina from Montreal

author: Carolina from Montreal
title: Carolina from Montreal
text:
The search engine is well built, making the choice selection easy to read, and "pick and reserve" in just a few clicks. First time booking on flight Hub and most likely will use the site for future bookings.
Great stuff, will recommend to friends and family.
